nodes.text: Natural was a shop that was located on the outskirts of the city of Gadrin, on the planet of Cularin. It operated during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.

The shop was established and run by the Human couple Selima DeWitt and Percival Vale; and the Cerean Higgie Sethven. It sold native crafts, local fruits and datacards about the Cularin fauna and flora. When Sethven discovered a drug that could be made from the star-mist plant, he contacted the company Genasys and they sent a security team to the shop, to meet with him. However, Culpharm, a rival company of Genasys, were tipped off about the deal and they sent a security team of their own, to prevent the meeting from happening. The Culpharm team attacked the Genasys one, resulting in a firefight in and around the shop. DeWitt, Vale and Sethven remained inside the building and were eventually rescued by the Heroes of Cularin.
